_sText:
Name : awp_perfect_2
Original author : Jb (KILLERSPREE.css@gmail.com)
Remake author : kore_ (kore@kore.sk)
Site : http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/games/2
Version : 2 HDR READY!
Spawnpoints : 32

Exact copy of the famous awp_map on CS1.6!

The only difference is the position of the spawnpoints to avoid the spawnkills.

Original (old) map is here : 

http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/29187
